explains: v. 违反，违背；侵犯，打扰；亵渎，损毁（神圣之地等）；<文>强奸

sentences.en: Thornburgh said such demands wouldn't violate the First Amendment.
sentences.cn: 桑伯说这样的要求不违反第一修正案。

sentences.en: Nuclear weapons seem to violate the just war principle of proportionality.
sentences.cn: 核武器似乎违背了罚当其罪的正义战争原则。

sentences.en: Those who violate traffic regulations should be punished.
sentences.cn: 那些违反交通规则的人应该受到惩罚。
